(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (MD might) (RB not)
      (VP (VB know)
        (NP (PRP it))))
    (, ,)))

neg(know-4, not-3)
root(ROOT-0, know-4)
dobj(know-4, it-5)

      (ADVP (RB aside))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN obsession))
    (ADVP (DT all))
    (VP (VBD started)
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP read)
            (PP (IN about)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Vera) (NNP Pizza) (NNP Napoletana))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT an) (NN association))
                        (VP (VBN set)
                          (PRT (RP up))
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB preserve)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT the) (JJ original) (NN pizza))
                                  (VP (VBN created)
                                    (PP (IN in)
                                      (NP (NNP Naples)))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(association-16, is-14)

partmod(association-16, set-17)
prt(set-17, up-18)
aux(preserve-20, to-19)
xcomp(set-17, preserve-20)
det(pizza-23, the-21)
amod(pizza-23, original-22)

  (S
    (NP (DT the)
      (NP
        (VP
          (VP (VB be)

          (NP (DT any) (NN pizza)))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (NN pizza) (NN base)))
    (. .)))

          (S
            (NP (NN bacon))

              (PP (IN in)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN class))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (PRP$ its) (JJ own)))))))))

          (NP (DT that) (JJ chewy) (NN texture))

            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB how))

                (NP (DT all) (JJ cured) (NNS meats))

                  (VP (VB have)))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP

          (NP (NNP Opp) (NNP Rex) (NNP Cinema))
          (-RRB- -RRB-))
        (NP (NNP Singapore) (CD 228678))))
    (ADJP
      (NP (CD 68843671) (NNS Opens))
      (JJ 12pm))
    (PP (IN till)
      (NP (NNP 11pm)
        (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
          (NP (NNP Closed) (NNP Mondays))
          (-RRB- -RRB-))
        (NN www.solepomodoro.com)))))

(ROOT
  (SINV
    (FRAG
      (NP (DT This) (NN review)))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (NN part))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT a) (NNS media)))))
    (NP (JJ tasting) (NN session) (NNP View) (NNP Larger) (NNP Map))))


det(review-2, This-1)
dep(part-4, review-2)
cop(part-4, was-3)
root(ROOT-0, part-4)
prep(part-4, of-5)
det(media-7, a-6)
